about_the_game:
Epic Story

After a thousand years of the divine rule of the great Lord of Holy Light, the gods suddenly abandoned the Land of Grace. A thousand years ago, the DEADLIGHT, which had been suppressed by the Lord of Holy Light, returned to the land once again. It was a cold yet dazzling light that covered the sky, like a frigid sun, suppressing the vitality of the earth. The temperature dropped, the fields lay barren, and famine and diseases ran rampant. The rule of the church declined. After a hundred years of chaos, a great plague dealt a fatal blow to the continent. People died or turned into monsters. The protagonist, after being infected with the plague, fell into an endless nightmare, only to be awakened by a mysterious voice, which told him to go to the Cathedral of Holy Light, once the center of the continent. The terrifying truth and the fate of the continent will be revealed during this arduous journey.

Adventure and Combat

Starting from the crumbling City of Ashes, climbing over the snow-capped Mountain of Extinction Sect, passing through the mysterious Black Moon Cave, and arriving at the already corrupt City of Worship. After that, entering the Cathedral of Holy Light, the center of theocracy and politics on the continent, and experiencing various strange environmental atmospheres.

Along the way, there will be sieges by monsters transformed from residents and animals as well as the infected church. Defeat them with agile movements and swordsmanship. With the discovery of secret items, the protagonist's memories will merge with the power within his body to obtain new skills to help you defeat the enemies.

The Protagonist and the Church's Secrets

Players will discover eerie texts along the way that record the unspeakable secrets of this world and the church, as well as the mysterious identity of the protagonist. They ultimately lie hidden on the path of pursuing the three endings. The fate of this world depends on your adventure.

Author and Development

The game was entirely developed by the author on his own, covering aspects such as the script, programming, art, music, and level design. It was completed after several arduous months of development and production. Hope you all like it and give it your generous support.

short_description: "DEADDAYLIGHT" is a side-scrolling platform action-adventure game.Developed independently by a single person. It tells the dark story of a protagonist who wakes up from a nightmare about the plague during a plague after the gods abandoned the earth, and then return to the Cathedral of Holy Light.
